connectionTimeout: Connection timeout. Failed to establish connection with the server
requestTimeout: Request timeout, server response took too long
responseTimeout: Response timeout, server processed but failed to return data in time
badCertificate: SSL certificate error, certificate verification failed
badResponse: Server response error, invalid data format received
networkError: Network connection error, please check your network settings
unknownError: Unknown error, an unexpected system error occurred
unexpectedError: System exception, an unanticipated error occurred
index_income_node_1: 1.Please ensure your node's status and service tasks are running normally. If any issues arise, contact customer support immediately.
index_income_node_2: 2.New nodes undergo a 3–5 day observation period. Low or no earnings during this time is normal—keep your node online 24/7.
index_income_node_3: 3.Enable IPv6 and UPnP for optimized network configuration. This is the simplest and most effective way to increase node earnings.
task_requirements_note: Different tasks have different device and network requirements, and rewards may vary.
task_check_t4: Currently only available in specific regions. Please verify if you meet the participation requirements.
task_check_t4_tip1: Sorry, no resources needed in your area.
task_check_t4_tip2: We're working to expand commercial demand to more regions. You can
task_check_t4_tip4: Congratulations! Your region is eligible to participate.
task_check_t4_tip6: Environment check failed. Unable to run.
task_check_t4_tip7: If you're in a supported environment, please try again later.
task_check_t4_tip8: Failed to detect runtime environment. Unable to run.
task_check_t4_tip9: Checking participation requirements. Please try again later.
task_check_t4_tip10: Starting up. Please try again later.
task_check_t4_15: Only available in some regions. Detecting..
bind_subtitle: Please bind your account in time to avoid loss of earnings. You can claim your earnings after binding.
bind_subtitle2_1: Keep going by binding your FIL Wallet and Titan FIL Wallet to enable automatic reward withdrawals.
bind_subtitle3: Detected abnormal binding of your email account, please rebind
bind_email_tip: If you haven't registered a Titan FIL account with this email, the system will automatically register one for you.
bind_verify_code_sent: A 6-digit verification code has been sent to your email. Please enter it.
bind_wallet_help_content: Once you bind your Titan FIL wallet address, your FIL rewards will be automatically withdrawn.
bind_wallet_tip: Third-party wallets are only supported on the web version. Please go to the web platform to complete the binding.
bind_click_to_view: Click to view the detailed tutorial
bind_no_start_node: You must start and run the node before binding your account
bind_code_snd_error: Failed to send verification code. Please try again later.
msg_dialog_run_administrator: Please run this program with administrator privileges
msg_dialog_ip_limit_error: The IP limit has been exceeded
msg_dialog_change_space: Node will automatically restart after modifying maximum storage allocation
msg_dialog_release_space: You must start and run the node to free up space
error_repo_path_invalid: Invalid repository path - path may not exist, was deleted, or has permission issues
error_clib_request_invalid: Library call request failed - requires fixing
error_clib_response_invalid: Library call response failed - requires fixing
error_open_path_error: Repository path error - may be locked by permissions or other processes
error_private_key_error: Node private key invalid - check path or regenerate
error_config_invalid: Invalid node configuration - please check config file
error_config_storage_path_invalid: Invalid node storage path - check config file
error_config_local_disk_load_error: Failed to load local disk configuration - requires repair
error_config_file_permission_error: Insufficient config file permissions - verify file access rights
error_download_file_failed: File download failed - check error details
error_new_edge_api_err: Local API connection failed - ensure daemon is running
error_edge_restart_failed: Node restart failed - check details or manually restart app
error_edge_network_err: Node network error - check connectivity or master node connection
error_req_disk_free_err: Disk cleanup request failed - possible scheduler issue
error_state_free_up_disk_err: Failed to get disk cleanup status - possible scheduler issue

settings_storage_free_space_tip: Freeing space will reduce potential earnings

pcd_hvError: Failed to enable Hyper-V - please enable manually using the help guide
pcd_hvError2: Hyper-V service failed to start - please start manually using the help guide
pcd_restartError: Agent/controller service not running - check Task Manager and restart
pcd_restartError2: Failed to restart agent/controller service - please follow manual instructions in help guide
pcd_env_tip_error: PCDN environment testing in progress - try again later
pcd_des:
Share idle bandwidth to earn FIL rewards and FIL tokens. 
 After running tasks, contribute your unused idle bandwidth to the Titan FIL for earnings. The more upload bandwidth consumed, the higher your earnings will increase.
storage_des:
Share idle storage to earn TNT3 rewards. 
 After running tasks, contribute your device's storage space to the Titan FIL for earnings. The more storage consumed, the higher your earnings will be.
vpn_des_tip: *Note: When using a proxy network, the displayed network information may differ from your actual connection. Data updates are not in real-time.
update_app_down_error: Update failed. Click to download the latest version manually
download_error: Download failed. Please try manual download
bug_questionDsc: Please describe your issue in detail
bug_feedbackDes: Select a feedback type to help us process your request faster
bug_feedbackSuccessfulNotice: Thank you for your support and contribution!
agent_error_empty: Agent program not found. Please download again.
install_mulptpass_tip: This application requires Multipass (a virtual machine environment) to function properly.
task_storage_load: The tss system is currently booting. Please wait a moment and try again.
task_pcdn_load: PCDN services are starting up. Please wait a moment before retrying.
task_pcdn_tip: Fetching virtual machine details. Please try again shortly
task_pcdn_tip2: Failed to query virtual machine information. Please check if PCDN has been started, or restart PCDN. After the PCDN task is successfully started, try again later.
task_pcdn_tip3: Please enter the configuration to be modified.
task_pcdn_tip4: Value must be at least 4 Cores
task_pcdn_tip8: PCDN tasks are running; stop them to proceed with settings.
task_pcdn_tip9: After adjusting the disk space, any further adjustments can only expand the capacity. Do you confirm this current adjustment?
task_pcdn_tip10: Value must be at least 10 Mbps
task_pcdn_bandwidth_des: Higher VM configuration yields higher revenue. Settings take effect only after the next task restart.
run_vpn_tip: It has been detected that your network is connected via a VPN, which may cause instability in PCDN node operation or even result in no earnings. Please completely exit the VPN program before running it.
run_vpn_tip2: To protect your earnings, check your network settings
run_vpn_tip3: Detect that your network is connecting through a VPN, which can lead to unstable node work or even no profit
run_vpn_tip4: Why do VPNs have an impact?
run_vpn_tip5:
A VPN hides your real IP and blocks external connections,
  making nodes inaccessible to scheduling systems and users,
 unable to receive tasks and transmit data, 
 and thus unable to contribute bandwidth and earn rewards.
run_vpn_tip7: Alerts you when the node status of the PCDN task is abnormal
run_vpn_tip8: Your PCDN node service status has been detected as: @@. We recommend that you check whether the network and device configurations meet the requirements or restart the PCDN task
run_vpn_btn3: View more details about the node
hot_tip: ToTo ensure a smoother and more stable experience, we recommend updating the program promptly.
hot_tip2: Please note, the program will restart during the update. Once complete, you can resume using all features smoothly.
hot_tip3: Confirm to exit, restart, and update.
hot_tip5: Update package download, do you want to cancel the download
hot_tip6: The installation package has been downloaded. Click 'Install Now' to close the application and begin installation
run_pcdn_net_tip: After the script execution, your current upload speed is below 10Mbps. It is recommended to check your network status to ensure that your earnings are not affected.
shouldShowPcndTip:
The PCDN task is not yet active.
